interest/situation: Enjoys the outdoors and access to nature
description:
A personalised oak photo block, printed with your photo above a love heart containing the initials of a couple, as if carved into the wood.

Create a sentimental gift by adding a favourite photo to this solid oak photo block. Add initials to appear in a heart below the image, that appears to have been romantically carved into the wood, to make a thoughtful, sentimental photo gift to cherish for years to come.

A perfect romantic gift for a partner on any occasion, including a birthday gift, anniversary gift (specifically fifth wedding anniversary, celebrated with wood!) or Valentine gift.

A great gift for the hard to buy for or the person who has everything! Simply add a favourite photo to bring a smile to the face of the recipient.

HOW TO SUPPLY YOUR PHOTO:
• Please supply your photo AFTER your order has been placed and email to orders [!at] thedriftingbear.com with your order number

PLEASE NOTE: If your image cannot be cropped to the portrait shape, and is more suited to a landscape format, we will produce your wooden block in landscape for you. The wood colour & grain will show through behind your photo, making the photo appear slightly darker. Please see example images.

made from:
Each wooden block is handcrafted from natural oak, sourced from sustainably managed forests. Each block is natural, meaning no oil, varnish, wax or stain, just natural wood, sanded on both front and back faces.

Your wood block will arrive in either tissue paper or a natural cotton gift bag, ready to give as a gift and will be sent out in plastic free packaging with tracked delivery.

dimensions:
Standard - 15cm x 10cm, 2cm thick.
Large - 15cm x 20cm, 2cm thick.

↟ EVERY ORDER PLANTS ONE TREE - As an additional gift to you & our planet, for every order placed, The Drifting Bear Co plant one tree in an area of the world that needs it most. ↟

An original design © The Drifting Bear Co.
product: Personalised Oak Photo Block With Heart And Initials

interest/situation: Enjoys the outdoors and access to nature
description: This personalized bumble bee garden stake adds charm to outdoor spaces. Made from durable 16g steel, it is weather-resistant and long-lasting. Personalize it with three lines of text to create a unique dedication. Choose from various finish options like Raw Steel, Outdoor Silver, and Gloss Clear to match any decor. The stake is fully assembled with an 18" stake for easy installation. Handcrafted with care, it brings charm and character to any garden or outdoor setting.

Our stunning Hanging Pendant Lamps, the perfect addition to any home or office. These beautifully crafted lamps are designed to add elegance and sophistication to your space while providing the perfect lighting solution.
Our Hanging Pendant Lamps come in a variety of styles and designs, from sleek and modern to classic and traditional.

interest/situation: May be interested in sustainable living and environmental issues
description:
This card features original watercolour and ink art by RossJDesigns, giving it a unique and personal touch that sets it apart from generic cards with mass-produced designs.
The card is made from 100% recycled white smooth 300gsm card (FSC approved) or 100% biodegradable seeded paper (embedded with a mix of wildflower seeds). This environmentally conscious approach differentiates it from generic cards that may use less sustainable materials.
The card is handmade, folded, and printed by the RossJDesigns team, adding a level of craftsmanship and attention to detail that is not found in generic cards.
The card can be mixed and matched with other designs from the same seller, allowing customers to create custom multipacks that reflect their personal style or the occasion. This flexibility sets it apart from generic cards that may have a limited range of designs.
10% of profits from the sale of this card is donated to planting trees and supporting sustainable projects, making it a thoughtful and impactful purchase.

interest/situation: May be working in a creative or tech industry
description: The Corporate Portfolio and Smart Thermos Gift Box is a high-quality gift box that includes a Business A5 Notebook Charger Diary, a 16oz Stainless Steel Smart Thermos, a Premium Carbon Fiber Pen, and a High Quality Gift Box. The gift box is perfect for corporate events, client gifts, or employee appreciation. The products in the gift box can be printed with your company logo or design for free. The gift box is processed within 1-3 days and shipping times vary depending on the shipping state.
product: Corporate Portfolio and Smart Thermos Gift Box

It is perfect for students, professionals, travelers, and creative individuals who need a versatile and stylish way to organize their important documents and devices.

interest/situation: May be part of a community garden or gardening group
description: A personalized garden to the recipient's family birth months, making it a truly unique and thoughtful gift. The garden planter and flowers are laser cut, ensuring precision and a high level of detail. It comes beautifully packaged and ready to be sent directly to the recipient, making it a convenient and hassle-free gift option. Each garden includes a note about the selected flowers and the months they represent, offering a touch of botanical knowledge. The garden is available in a range of sizes (2, 3, 4, 5, or 6 flower planters), allowing it to be customized to fit different spaces and preferences.

interest/situation: May be part of a community garden or gardening group
description:
This exquisite Birth Month Flower Personalized Outdoor Flower Pot is the perfect gift for grandmothers or mothers on special occasions like Mother's Day. The personalized birth month flower design represents a floral bouquet, symbolizing the presence of all her cherished ones.

Personalization Details:
- Enter 2-6 Names: Include Birth Months for each name (each name can be up to 12 characters).
- Optional dates can be added for each name.
- Line 1 in Bold: Up to 18 characters (e.g., Mom's Garden).
- Line 2 in Script: Up to 24 characters (e.g., love grows here).

Features:
- Plants not included.
- Recommended for outdoor use due to the drainage hole at the base.
- Crafted with precision from fine-quality, heavy-weight, chip-resistant stoneware.
- Dimensions: 7.25” H x 6.5” in diameter.
- Imported.

description: This personalized outdoor flower pot is a unique and thoughtful gift for loved ones. Made from fine-quality, heavy-weight, chip-resistant stoneware, this flower pot is durable and long-lasting. It features a traditional design with a raised rim and drainage hole, making it perfect for outdoor use. The flower pot can be personalized with up to 20 names and two lines of text, making it a one-of-a-kind gift.

description: This outdoor wine table is a portable, foldable serving table that can be used for picnics, parties, or everyday use. It is made of natural, ecological, and high-quality tree wood and is coated with a special vegetable oil that prevents moisture and food from getting inside the wood. The table has a diameter of 350mm and a height of 180mm. It can be personalized with an inscription in the center, making it a unique and thoughtful gift.

interest/situation: May be interested in attending farmers markets and local food events
description:
This folding wooden wine table is the perfect accessory for picnics, patio evenings, and camping adventures. It conveniently folds, making it easy to take with you to outdoor spaces.
The compact size of the table accommodates one wine bottle and four glasses. Ideal for use outdoors or relaxing in nature, it also doubles as a tray and caddy, adding charm to any setting, whether you're enjoying a beach getaway or a cozy evening under the stars.
Crafted with love and designed for unforgettable moments, it's a must-have for wine enthusiasts and outdoor enthusiasts alike. Plus, it makes a romantic gift for couples, a thoughtful honeymoon gift, or a unique wedding gift.
Size: 13.8"x13.8"x8.6" / 35x35x22 cm.
- The wine table is made of Birch plywood and can be easily folded and fixed in both open and closed positions.
- Two handles are harmoniously included in the wine table so that you can easily take this table with you.
- To make your wine table unique, you can ADD a Custom engraving - follow the ordering instructions (choose your desired style from the drop-down menu and add your personalization).
- In order to maintain the original appearance of the wine table, it should be wiped with a damp cloth and wiped dry after each use. Preferably keep indoors.

interest/situation: Enjoys creating and nurturing things
description:
Looking for the best Baby Gift? Personalized Wooden Busy Board with Name Puzzle is a great gift for baby boy or baby girl First Birthday, 1st Christmas, Baby shower. 

Busy Board with Name Puzzle is a great idea to turn the process of learning letters into a play! 

Sensory board improves fine motor skills, babies play with new objects, shapes, colors and studies them, it helps to develop logic, memory, finger grip and attention.

Our Name Puzzle made from non-toxic high quality plywood, we carefully polish every detail, the pegs for letters and shapes are mounted very securely for the safety of your baby! 

For painting we use safe Certified water based paint, the color can be chosen from the proposed options.

Approximate Dimensions 

*Length: 14.57 inches (37 cm)
*Height:  9 inches (23 cm)

The specified sizes refer to a puzzle up to 6-7 letters. The size of your puzzle will depend on the number of letters in your child's name. If the name has more than 6-7 letters, the size of the board will be increased.

The base of the board is 0.35 inches thin (9 mm) and each letter is 0.24 inches thin (6 mm) and  2.44 inches tall (62 mm).

IF IN YOUR PUZZLE YOU HAVE LETTER ”I” - BE ATTENTIVE. THIS SHAPES CAN BE DANGEROUS FOR KIDS 0-3. DON’T LEAVE YOUR CHILD ALONE,  Instead - play with your kid and collect memories 😊
product: Personalized Wooden Busy Board with Name Puzzle

interest/situation: May be interested in food photography or culinary arts
description: This personalized ring dish is a unique and thoughtful gift for weddings, anniversaries, engagements, birthdays, holidays, and everything in between. It is made of a durable, non-ceramic material that is lightweight and pliable, making it less likely to break if dropped. Each dish is molded, stamped, painted, and sealed by hand, making each one unique. It is perfect for holding rings, jewelry, or other small items. The dish can be personalized with a name, date, or other special message, making it a truly one-of-a-kind gift.

interest/situation: May be interested in food photography or culinary arts
description: This exquisite marble charcuterie board set includes everything you need to create a stunning presentation of meats, cheeses, and appetizers. Meticulously crafted from premium marble and acacia wood, it boasts a unique and sophisticated design. The set also comprises three ceramic bowls for dips and accompaniments, complemented by three wooden spoons and a four-piece cheese knife set, all made from top-quality materials. Make it uniquely yours with our laser engraving option! Choose from a variety of designs and customize the red areas with a name, date, or special message. Embrace the natural charm of acacia wood, featuring varying colors, markings, knots, and rustic details, making each board truly one-of-a-kind. To maintain the marble and acacia wood's beauty, hand wash the serving board and apply mineral oil for a polished finish.

interest/situation: May be interested in attending fashion shows or reading fashion magazines
description:
Elevate your style with our personalized cufflinks, meticulously crafted for those who appreciate distinctive details. Whether it's a date, location, monogram, initials, special message, or a name, our cufflinks make excellent gifts for dads, graduates, boyfriends, grooms, and wedding parties.

Materials & Craftsmanship:
• Material: Premium Quality 925 Sterling Silver and Durable Steel.
• Quantity: Listed as '1' refers to one pair (set) of cufflinks, ensuring clarity for our customers.
• Thickness: Our cufflinks boast an exclusive 2mm thickness, an uncommon feature that offers superior durability and design.
• Weight: Crafted with an average silver weight of 8-10 grams, depending on the selected letters, ensuring longevity and a premium feel.
• Finish: Sterling Silver, 18K Gold Filled, Dark Grey (RHODIUM).
• Production Method: Every pair is handmade, reflecting our commitment to quality.

Customization Options:
Tailor your cufflinks to suit your preferences. Whether it's a name, text, letters, number, or any other engravings, we've got you covered.

Ordering Process:
For a seamless experience, simply specify your desired engravings in the 'NOTES' section upon ordering.

Gift Wrapping:
Each set of our cufflinks comes in a beautifully designed gift box, making it perfect for occasions like birthdays, anniversaries, or just a special treat for yourself. Let us know if you'd like to include a personalized message for your loved one.

Shipping & Delivery:
• Handmade Just For You: Your order will be crafted in 1-3 business days.
• Shipping Options: Choose between standard shipping (7-9 days) or expedite with UPS Express (2-4 business days).

Connect With Us:
For our full collection and exclusive offers, visit:
www.etsy.com/shop/jewellerydesignstore

From the crafting table to your wardrobe, each piece is made with passion and precision. Warm wishes, ♡, Huseyin
----------------------------------------------
• All images are copyrighted by PersonalCufflinks. All rights reserved •

interest/situation: May be interested in writing or reading about books and literature
description: The personalized poetry journal is a unique and meaningful gift for poets, writers, and authors. It features a vintage-inspired design with a distressed hardcover and aged text, giving it a unique and antique aesthetic. The journal can be personalized with any name, making it a special and meaningful gift. Its compact size makes it easy to carry and use on the go, providing a convenient way to capture inspiration and express creativity. The journal is made with high-quality materials, including a smooth matte hardcover and lined pages, ensuring durability and a premium writing experience. It can be used for various purposes, such as poetry writing, songwriting, journaling, and even as a stage prop or gift for English teachers and students.

interest/situation: May be interested in writing or reading about books and literature
description: This personalized book stamp is perfect for book lovers. It can be customized with your own wording or common phrases like "From the Library of" or you can even give your custom text. There are many designs to choose from or you can get in touch to create your own unique design. The stamp is self-inking, making it easy and convenient to use. This eliminates the need for a separate ink pad, ensuring a quick and mess-free stamping experience. The stamp is made of high-quality materials, ensuring its durability and longevity. This means you can enjoy using it for a long time without worrying about it breaking or becoming damaged.

description: The Personalized Tea & Biscuits Board is a wooden board designed to hold a mug of drink (tea, coffee, etc.) and a treat (biscuits, cake, etc.). It makes a lovely personalized gift for someone who enjoys tea & biscuits, elevenses, etc. The board measures approximately 230mm x 150mm x 15mm and features an engraved 'TEA & BISCUITS' design. You can replace the word 'Grandad's' with the name of your choice and add a personalized message under the 'TEA & BISCUITS'.

Custom orders are also available, allowing customers to request specific book titles or arrangements.

The stand also serves as a bookmark, allowing users to continue reading from where they left off. The stand is eco-friendly and sustainable, and is completely handcrafted by manual labor, making each product unique.

description: Art Dice is a set of 9 color-coded wood dice designed to help artists overcome creative blocks and enhance their skills. Each die represents a different element of art, such as medium, style, subject, mood, texture, setting, and color. By rolling the dice, users can generate thousands of unique combinations that inspire new ideas and challenge them to experiment with different approaches. The dice can be used by artists of all levels, teachers, and anyone interested in drawing or painting, making it a versatile tool for both personal and educational purposes. Art Dice can be played alone or with others, promoting collaboration and making it an excellent resource for art classes and teaching demonstrations.
